participant_1.background:
I love to see my son's face light up when he sees his new toys in his nursery.
i always sleep 8 hours a day.
i have never had alcohol.
my hair is colored purple.
I wake up early to feed my cats and then work on my laptops until it's time to get ready for my wedding in the park.

participant_2.background:
I take my mother chocolate milk shakes when I visit her in the hospital.
i like antiques.
I had a great time on my road trip with my siblings.
i cannot get enough gummy worms to satisfy my sweet tooth.
i enjoy reading and cooking.

content.text: What a nice day! How are you?
Hey there! I am doing well. I just got back from visiting my mother in the hospital.
Oh no! I hope she is doing alright.
She is doing as well as can be expected. She had a heart attack last week.
I am so sorry to hear that. I am sending good vibes her way.
Thank you. That means a lot.
What did you do for your siblings on your road trip?
We played board games, listened to music, and sang karaoke. It was a lot of fun.
That sounds like a blast! I love board games.
Me too! What are your favorite ones?
I love Clue, Monopoly, and Scrabble.
Those are all great games! I also like Monopoly and Scrabble.
What are your favorite things to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes, soups, and roasts.
I love pasta dishes too! I am not a very good cook, but I love to bake.
Baking is fun! I love to make cookies and cakes.
I love to make cookies too! I am not very good at making cakes, though.
We should have a bake-off sometime!
